SELECT STF.STF_SQ, STF.STF_PT_RT, STF.STF_NM, RNK.RNK_NM, DD.DPT_NM, ADMN.ADMN_PW, STF.STF_PH, STF.STF_BS_PH, STF.STF_EML FROM STF_TB STF, ADMN_TB ADMN, RNK_TB RNK, DPT_DIV_TB DD WHERE ADMN.ADMN_SQ = STF.ADMN_SQ AND RNK.RNK_SQ = STF.RNK_SQ AND DD.DPT_SQ = STF.DPT_SQ
AND STF.STF_NM LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
AND RNK.RNK_NM LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
AND DD.DPT_NM LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY RNK.RNK_SQ DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM STF_TB STF, ADMN_TB ADMN, RNK_TB RNK, DPT_DIV_TB DD WHERE ADMN.ADMN_SQ = STF.ADMN_SQ AND RNK.RNK_SQ = STF.RNK_SQ AND DD.DPT_SQ = STF.DPT_SQ
AND STF.STF_NM LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
AND RNK.RNK_NM LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
AND DD.DPT_NM LIKE #{keyword} || '%'
